name: Lightning Bingo - May Flowers
description:
Enter the crystalline empire of the Winterland Creatures. Dig in the afterimage of the burning cold wintertide season.

Welcome to our new bingo games, This number game is a classic bingo on steroid, or in other words, it’s a SUPER BINGO. Super fun and super exciting! Get as many coins as possible to unlock beautiful images created by our talented artist and move on to the next part of our super bingo game. This is an awesome bingo or every bingo game fan!

The rule of the game is pretty simple: numbers will appear and you need to decide if the number is on your Bingo Game Card or not. Decide as fast as possible because time is limited in our super bingo game. Complete rows or all four corners to earn points.

What does it takes to win our bingo? You need to be fast and accurate. Accuracy is very important because this bingo will deduct your time if you make a mistake. It’s truly an exciting speed game and number game in one.
Don’t worry! Our new bingo game will help you get more coins! We have special powerups such as Time Extender and Score Multiplier. You can also trigger autoplay to let this bingo bash game automatically mark the card for you.

★★★ Lightning Bingo TOP FEATURES: ★★★
- Addictive new style bingo that everyone loves.
- Simple number game to play, hard to win.
- Challenging fast-pace speed game that requires accuracy and speed.
- Powerups and autoplay to help in this bingo when you’re overwhelmed.
- Unlock beautiful images after you collect certain amount of coins.


The spring is here! Celebrate the beautiful spring with this colorful May Flowers themed game. Gaze upon the garden and green meadow where daisies, violets, and other flowers bloom. View the colorful butterflies and the cheerful song of birds flying around. Plant your rose garden to enjoy its scent and beauty. It is truly one of the best seasons to be alive!

Do you like spring time? May is one of the most beautiful months in a year with its warm and sunny weather and everywhere flowers are blooming in earnest. This is a time to have a picnic on the meadow and plant your garden with colorful roses and violets. Pick some daisies and arrange a bouquet of wild flowers. Listen to chirping of the naughty song birds and the dance of butterfly. May is truly a magical time and we invite you to celebrate the spring time with our beautifully designed game.
